Vaccines are substances that train your immune system to produce antibodies and reduces tje chance of getting covid 19. To book a slot and know about vaccination in India refer: https://www.mohfw.gov.in/covid_vaccination/vaccination/ and https://www.bannerhealth.com/healthcareblog/teach-me/everything-to-know-about-covid-19-vaccinations. Following the online registration, you will recieve SMS on your registered mobile no. regarding details.

patterns: what is guideline for home quarantine
responses: The patients who are clinically assigned to be mild /asymptomatic are recommended for home isolation. The govt of India gave a home quarantine guideline which can be found at: https://www.cdc.gov/coronavirus/2019-ncov/if-you-are-sick/quarantine.html

patterns: what should i eat during quarantine
what can i do for health in covid
responses: During covid, the patient should consume fresh fruits and vegetables and keep a check on salt and sugar intake. More details about health at nutrition can known from http://www.emro.who.int/nutrition/news/nutrition-advice-for-adults-during-the-covid-19-outbreak.html and   https://www.euro.who.int/en/health-topics/health-emergencies/coronavirus-covid-19/publications-and-technical-guidance/food-and-nutrition-tips-during-self-quarantine

Anyone who has recovered from COVID within the last three-four months can donate plasma every two weeks. Refer to the link to know about donating plasma https://www.donatingplasma.org/who and https://dhoondh.com/

Coronavirus disease (COVID-19) is an infectious disease caused by a newly discovered coronavirus. Most people who fall sick with COVID-19 will experience mild to moderate symptoms and recover without special treatment. Know more about active cases,vaccinations, discharged and statewise distribution from https://www.mohfw.gov.in

patterns: how can i help someone with covid
what to do when somone near you have covid
responses: When someone around you have corona, help them to follow their doctorâ€™s instructions for care and medicine and keep checking on them. More can be known from: https://www.cdc.gov/coronavirus/2019-ncov/if-you-are-sick/care-for-someone.html

patterns: what can i do for fitness in covid
is it ok to exercise in quarantine
responses: Physical activity and relaxation techniques can be valuable tools to help you remain calm and continue to protect your health during this time. WHO recommends 150 minutes of moderate-intensity or 75 minutes of vigorous-intensity physical activity per week, or a combination of both. However if you are caught up with the virus, it is recommended to rest and avoid physical activity. Know more about fitness in covid at: https://www.timesnownews.com/health/article/exercise-may-not-be-good-for-covid-19-patients-when-should-you-begin-physical-activity-post-illness/646938

COVID-19 affects different people in different ways. Most infected people will develop mild to moderate illness and recover without hospitalization. Most common symstoms: fever, cough, tiredness, aches and pain and soar throat. Know more about symtoms at https://www.who.int/health-topics/coronavirus#tab=tab_3

Few preventions and slow transmsission for covid 19 include: Washing hands regularly with soap, water, or alcohol-based hand rub; Maintain at least 1 metre distance between you and people coughing or sneezing; Avoid touching your face; Refrain from smoking and other activities that weaken the lungs; Practice physical distancing by avoiding unnecessary travel and staying away from large groups of people. Know more about prevention at https://www.who.int/health-topics/coronavirus#tab=tab_2
